justification: Trade asks Team B to give up Tier-1 QB and RB plus a Tier-2 WR for a Tier-3 QB and Tier-5 RB. It ignores B’s consensus-driven, conservative mindset and preference for pocket passers (James Jones is dual-threat) and urgent need for immediate, high-floor production. Acceptance probability is unrealistic. Rationale is generic and doesn’t address B’s incentives, roster needs, or risk profile.
